# django-events

Django application allow to create site warnings, make subscription, and receive notifies.

## Install

```
pip install django-site-warnings
```

## Releases

### v0.1.2

- First release.

### v0.1.4

- Make title length longer. 

### v0.1.6

- Test for Django 3.2.
- Work with django-simpletask2.
